title: What do you think of the advancement of the technology today? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a lot of optimism about how technology is advancing. I think the problems will not be technological, but sociological and political. Great tools can solve problems and some people see other people as problems to be dealt with. AI, quantum technology, nuclear fusion and room temperatue super-conductors are exciting near-future possibilities. They will be used for good and not-so-good solutions to world problems. I have seen huge accomplishments in my life-time and I am opptimistic about what will be done with the great inventions of the next few decades.

The today technology is partly good to us . The new advantage of technology has been fast in the 21st century. The electronic technology and machines being improved all time. Everyday other company brings out something advanced in an attempt to win the consumer war.
